Today, Dan and Jordan go back to the past to see what Alex Jones was up to right before the public unveiling of the Tea Party. In doing so, the gents end up uncovering numerous racist narratives, and a gigantic lie about Hurricane Katrina.

==Tidbits==

*Alex has 8 stacks of news, but not enough time to get to it
*Airport body scanners are designed to catalog your digital body algorithm
*Alex's numbers were rising just before tea party
*Predator drones will patrol the country and use your body scan to track and kill you
*The queen of england has a royal butt wiper: the groom of the stool
*School drill blew up a bus because homeschooling is bad
*Lt Col Greg Hapgood was about to cry and breakdown when he was on InfoWars (no he wasn't)
*Flashback: Alex badgers Hapgood to try to trip him up, Hapgood handles himself
*National guard confiscated guns after Katrina (wrong)
*New Orleans PD has a history of seizing weapons from black people
*Alex only cares because they seized weapons from white people
*Alex isn't anti-Muslim in 2009
*Is Jordan the next Alex Jones?
*Schools are designed to jail your kids and put them on Prozac
*The point of family court is to kill you
*Caller lists globalists, doesn't include Soros
*Alex hates Michael Savage
*Alex likes Iran
*Israel is comminting acts of war
